title: Ivanka Trump heads to Capitol Hill Tuesday
text:
Ivanka Trump heads to Capitol Hill Tuesday
Ivanka Trump will huddle Tuesday afternoon with just over a dozen female Republican Senators and House members on Capitol Hill, multiple sources told POLITICO.
The GOP presidential nominee’s daughter will talk more about her father’s new childcare policy platform, which she helped create. She'll also hear from women in Congress about their own ideas and proposals related to family issues, women in the workplace, job flexibility and equal pay, one source added.
Story Continued Below
It’s all part of a policy roundtable hosted by House Republican Conference Chairwoman Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-Wash.). The event kicks off at 3 p.m. at the Republican National Committee.
Politico Magazine
By Austin Sarat and Jonathan Obert
